about.headline: About me
about.introductionText: My journey with coding started in childhood as a computer enthusiast, and was formally launched through an intensive and rewarding Front-End bootcamp at Developer Akademie. I see programming as a successful, endless journey—a fascinating path where I have already achieved many milestones. The dynamic tech world constantly fuels my curiosity and drive. I am excited to connect and contribute to meaningful projects.
about.locationText: Based in Siegen, NRW, I am open to remote positions but cannot relocate.
about.learningText: I am passionate about learning new technologies and continuously advancing my skills.
about.solvingText: My problem-solving style is hands-on and iterative. I work well independently but actively seek collaboration on tougher challenges, blending careful planning with actionable solutions.

skills.headline: Skills
skills.description: Through hands-on work with diverse projects, I've built strong skills in modern frontend technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I'm always eager to learn and adapt to new tools and frameworks. For me, continuous growth is essential to stay current in the fast-evolving field of web development.
skills.followup: Enthusiastic about learning new technologies and frameworks.
